resources.string:
Please select the 4 beacons you want to use.

Keep track of the names of your beacons! You will be setting them up in a specific order later on.

Note: Smaller RSSI values correspond to closer beacons.

Move clockwise around the room and place one beacon in the center of each wall, in the order you selected them.

Then, stand at the corner between the 1st and 2nd beacon and press the button; move clockwise and do this for every corner.

Later on, the order will be displayed and the instructions will change with each button press.
This is the last step in the map generation process.
The map has finished generating! Access the map by pressing the \"Continue\" button below.

Welcome to the Pinpoint Setup Wizard! When you press "Continue", you will be taken through the process to setup a Pinpoint map.

Before moving on, make sure that you have at least 4 Accent Systems iBKS beacons configured. No special configuration is required, just followed the instructions that are provided.

WARNING: This system is built on the iBKS SDK; using beacons other than those by Accent Systems may result in errors.
